verses.name: Hosea 4:7
verses.text: As they were increased, so they sinned against me: therefore will I change their glory into shame.

verses.name: Hosea 4:8
verses.text: They eat up the sin of my people, and they set their heart on their iniquity.

verses.name: Hosea 4:9
verses.text: And there shall be, like people, like priest: and I will punish them for their ways, and reward them their doings.

verses.name: Hosea 4:10
verses.text: For they shall eat, and not have enough: they shall commit whoredom, and shall not increase: because they have left off to take heed to the Lord.

verses.name: Hosea 4:11
verses.text: Whoredom and wine and new wine take away the heart.
